name: graylog-vyos
summary: Graylog content pack for VyOS router syslog messages
description: Contains a Syslog UDP input on port 1514, extractors to extract message data into searchable fields, and a pipeline configured to geo-locate src_ip addresses (requires MaxMind City Lite 2 database--see maxmind.com for details).

source.@value:
rule "Copy 'frame_type' to 'ethertype'"
when
    has_field("frame_type")
then
    set_field("ethertype", to_string($message.frame_type));
end

description.@value: Look up GeoIP City for Source IP

title.@value: Firewall Rule Action: D to Drop

description.@value: Firewall Rule Action: Change D to Drop

source.@value:
rule "Firewall Rule Action: D to Drop"
when
  to_string($message.rule_action) == "D"
then
  set_field("rule_action", "Drop");
end

description.@value: Validates that field 'ruleset' is not present.
Stream containing all messages that are not firewall messages

source.@value:
rule "Message has firewall rules"
when
    has_field("src_ip") && has_field("dst_ip")
then
end

title.@value: Firewall Rule Action: A to Accept

description.@value: Firewall Rule Action: Change A to Accept

source.@value:
rule "Firewall Rule Action: A to Accept"
when
  to_string($message.rule_action) == "A"
then
  set_field("rule_action", "Accept");
end

pipeline "VyOS Firewall Messages"
stage 0 match either
rule "Message has firewall rules"
stage 1 match either
rule "GeoIP lookup: src_ip"
rule "Firewall Rule Action: A to Accept"
rule "Firewall Rule Action: D to Drop"
rule "Firewall Rule Action: R to Reject"
rule "Copy 'frame_type' to 'ethertype'"
end

grok_pattern.@value: level=%{WORD:prom_level} ts=%{DATA:prom_timestamp} caller=%{DATA:prom_caller} msg=\"%{DATA:prom_error}\" name=%{DATA:prom_collector_name} duration_seconds=%{DATA:prom_duration_seconds} err=\"%{DATA:prom_error_message}\"

title.@value: Firewall: Extract MAC Addresses and Frame Type
Firewall: Extract SRC and DST IP Fields

grok_pattern.@value: <%{DATA:syslog_priority_value}>%{DATA:syslog_protocol_version} %{DATA:datetime} %{DATA:host} %{WORD:application_name} - - - \[%{DATA:time_stamp}\] %{DATA}_%{DATA:ruleset}_%{DATA:rule_action}: IN=%{WORD:if_in} OUT= MAC=%{COMMONMAC:dst_mac}:%{COMMONMAC:src_mac}:%{DATA:frame_type} SRC=%{IPV6:src_ip} DST=%{IPV6:dst_ip} LEN=%{WORD:length} TC=%{WORD:tc} HOPLIMIT=%{WORD:hop_limit} FLOWLBL=%{WORD:flow_label} PROTO=%{WORD:protocol} SPT=%{WORD:spt} DPT=%{WORD:dpt} LEN=%{WORD:len}

<%{DATA:syslog_priority_value}>%{DATA:syslog_protocol_version} %{DATA:datetime} %{DATA:host} %{WORD:application_name} - - - \[%{DATA:time_stamp}\] %{DATA}_%{DATA:ruleset}_%{DATA:rule_action}: IN=%{WORD:if_in} OUT= MAC= SRC=%{IPV6:src_ip} DST=%{IPV6:dst_ip} LEN=%{WORD:length} TC=%{WORD:tc} HOPLIMIT=%{WORD:hop_limit} FLOWLBL=%{WORD:flow_label} PROTO=%{WORD:protocol} SPT=%{WORD:spt} DPT=%{WORD:dpt} LEN=%{WORD:len}

<%{DATA:syslog_priority_value}>%{DATA:syslog_protocol_version} %{DATA:datetime} %{DATA:host} %{WORD:application_name} - - - \[%{DATA:time_stamp}\] %{DATA}_%{DATA:ruleset}_%{DATA:rule_action}: IN=%{GREEDYDATA:if_in} OUT= MAC= SRC=%{IPV6:src_ip} DST=%{IPV6:dst_ip} LEN=%{WORD:length} TC=%{WORD:tc} HOPLIMIT=%{WORD:hop_limit} FLOWLBL=%{WORD:flow_label} PROTO=%{WORD:protocol} SPT=%{WORD:spt} DPT=%{WORD:dpt} LEN=%{WORD:len}

title.@value: VyOS Firewall: Syslog Header, Rule Info & Interfaces
VyOS Firewall: Extract Source and Destination Zones from Ruleset
Firewall Rule Action: R to Reject

description.@value: Firewall Rule Action: Change R to Reject

source.@value:
rule "Firewall Rule Action: R to Reject"
when
  to_string($message.rule_action) == "R"
then
  set_field("rule_action", "Reject");
end
